comment.body: to open and close sidebar is not easy, i need do right click on top right button it opens first context menu, it would be easyer left click on that Button for show/hide the siderbar. and doesnt get it worked close the side bar, when i click on (0) Button it goes back to mainpage. or we need more Menu Entry for the (O) Button to Open ZeroNet Main Page, Side Bar (Stats)
Thx for this, the Side looks coool :)
